items.name: of

comment.description: generates high-quality documentation for code given to it by returning a `PageInfo` object containing information about the specified pageable and page.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pagination information for thePage<?> object passed as an argument to the function.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing its total elements and pages count to construct the `PageInfo` object.
